transcript.text: I always feel bad when I don't know what to do for the introduction, I asked you all on twitter
to send me drawings about me and my Youtube universe
On the hashtag #SqueezieFanArt, Fanart aren't new
I receive fanarts everyday since many years and I wanted, in video,
to pay tribute to people
who draw fanarts, because it's time, skill and I think it is worth
to highlight these drawings
*French expression which means to highlights*
Let's look to these drawings together...
We start with a simple but efficace drawing, it looks like a girl, excellent,
this is actually very good, I don't want to criticize. OH, *reads* "we miss Djumbo"
So, first of all, you insult him by putting a "D" before the "J"
because there is no "D", we say "Djumbo" but we write that "Jumbo" (French does not pronounce the "J" like "Dj")
and the cat on this picture is way cuter than Jumbo,
and it's certainly not Jumbo, this is an Angora, look that,
Yes, I'm a motherfucker, I'm criticizing drawings today! And yes, it is an Angora,
And now I show you the picture of a Jumbo, they don't look same and he is more ugly but SOOOOOO CUUUUTE~
Okay, we go on, OHHHH,
Drawn by a YouTuber, "TutoDraw", holy shit, he did a great job,
I'm so hot, I could attract guys easily, I take the opportunity to
say a little word, I have seen the community of people who draw fanarts is a little bit angry
because many people steal their drawings by typing "Squeezie fanart" on Google and to litterally steal their creations,
they post of social medias and they say "it's me who have drawn that!"
DON'T DO IT, it's not cool for artists, respect their works
or just credit them if you use their drawings, like him
so we know it's TutoDraw who did that.
There is my Squeezie Fanart, I'm sorry but I did it fast, hairs we finally loved, oh it's cute,
very beautiful eyes, oh stop >///>, virility and passion
Oh fuck woooooooow! Thank you Julieta Chaparro,
Ooooooooooh, it's "Last Guardian", I knew it would be warm your heart,
This for instance, it's obligatory he stole this fanart,
But dude, just don't do it! I don't know who did this fanart but it's very beautiful.
OOOOOOOAAAAAH, Trico and Squeezie,
how touching, congratulations to Brohan. So here, we are on a drawing
of the same quality, so first, you made me a horse body,
this is a huge lack of respect, "this is crabs game, not abs"
Okay, +1 point for this joke that made me laugh.
Olala "I took more than 4h on this", hey it's inspired from a picture I took in Japan
in a dog's bar where there were two chibas,
they were so cute, I put a photo, you can look to them on my Instagramm "xSqueezie", don't hesitate!
The best autopromotion never done.
OULAH, there are so many elements, Squeezie, Squeezette, the pervert,
it is from my older videos
with the lamp, you remember for that?
Nostalgy is here.
So, a little reference to my actual youtube profile picture,
little reference to the fidget spinners, it's a pleasure or not!
Trico in the background, Ironman because I love him, Sponge Bob because I have a Sponge bob doll
Wow, the number of references, it's crazy! The lamp with wings,
Myself here with a skirt I have tried during
the Cyprien's live, everybody remember of that!
"it's look like an erection"
Super cool, congrats to Fanny Queen.
Wow, this is crazy,  except this one, you people have such skill
Ohh, nice, congrats Axelle, and it's him who post this.
But you are not Axelle? Why do you steal fucking fanarts
on Google?! I don't know if it's a filter or a drawing,
you make so stylish drawings that sometimes, I can't say if it's a drawing or a photo
Ohhh, "my Squeezie fanart is not in my pictures ;-; Maybe because it's a commentary? I have to get used to Twitter x)"
Don't worry Luurei, we have seen that
and it is extremly beautiful! Jumbo has never been so stylish
it's look like more a tiger and not a house cat with his head stomped
Ahhhhh, yes, it's a pleasure to see that.
WOOOW, it's cool!
Wait, I take a dictionnary, I take it for all my videos now and in one hour, you do something that
I wouldn't do in 10 years!
*intense pain* Damn, it's heavy! The angle hurts
Wait, it's not a fanart, it's a picture, wait I will give you the differences,
*Looking for the definions*
Drawing : "a graphic representation by lines of an object or idea, as with a pencil; a delineation of form without reference to color." (credit : dictionary.com)

And picture? "the process or art of producing images of objects on sensitized surfaces by the chemical action of light or of other forms of radiant energy, as x-rays, gamma rays, or cosmic rays."  (credit dictionary.com)
Is it clear? It's the dictionary's words. So this is a picture. Lost.
Oh man, what did you do with my face?
I hope I will never have this face one day,
or with a car crash, but I would never have this face. Damn, even my Iphone is deformed.
Roh, we are laughing, it's false, sometimes we need to have fun, I'm the first to love my drawings!
Sq- Sqezze? Holy shit, I don't even look to your drawing,
you fucked my name so violenty, I don't look at it.
Oh, it's beautiful, "I post it again because I forgot my signature" -Sarachu
You are doing well to put your signature, I invite all the artists to do same, it's inconspicuous
and we would at least know who made it.
Wow, he did me so fine! In summer, I have the hairs which goes blonde
but thanks for this fanart,
the crab is not here haha, it's not here, it's here on this side,
Wow, how did you make it, with a ferret? (Squeezie said "Furet" instead of "Fusain" which means "Charcoal")
It's the terms I learned in art class,
Oh, it is Jumbo! A improved Jumbo! Here the final version with colours!
Woah, this is great, well done! So, this is a photography, not a drawing.
Do I need to make you remember the definition of photography?
No, I won't do this, don't worry, don't leave the video!
With those little hairs... WOW, it's crazy!
There are a lot of people who actually know how to draw, you are artists!
"So Squezzie?" I think that when you draw for 4h a fanart
you know how to write the username for the person you are doing it!
Florent, impostor! I use bullets against impostors!
Take this! Woah, step by step,
first you do a kind of sketch where the traits are not clear, then you make clear traits,
then you add colours and finally, you add a little smiley
WOOOOUAH,
it's wonderful, this is a mix between Jumbo and Trico, this is great!
We will call him "Tribo", sooooo, that's what we call an Instagram filter,
"Jean-michel faking. After all, I don't draw well, Squeezie and I are same. LOOK TO THIS SMOKING PIPE!" Well done!
"I already start the #SqueezieFanArt a few months ago so I finished that for the occasion"
It totally looks like Diablo,
shoked but not disappointed, a little drawing taking reference to the little product placement's MV
that's cute that's cute, hey, you love cats!
You prefer my cats than me, that's crazy! Wow "I didn't finish it but I think this looks like you a little"
but this is extremly creepy.
"I missed of time to finish the background, I can finish and send again if you want because it's ugly"
NO, STOP! IT ANNOYS ME!
ARTISTS WHO DO THAT, RESPECT YOURSELF, IT'S BEAUTIFUL!
When an artist do something are always like "meh it's not very beautiful" SHUT UP, it's very good
what you just did, just trust in yourselves.
I "fav" it.
Damn it!
Wtf, what is that eye? There was a glitch on Paint, you did Ctrl+Z,
it wasn't working anymore, too late, the eye is like that,
you clicked "export" and I sent him.
wow, you are so talented, the video is just that,
me saying "Wouah so good!"
wow wow wow woooooow woooooow
Wow, it's so stylish, McCree, Jackie Chan,
the crab, there are elements that made an impression in my videos
it's funny, you remember that and you put it on your drawings.
"Made in 3h, don't judge it, I'm just 13, there are a lot of mistakes"
Stop criticizing yourselves!...
This is great, except the fact I have holes in the hair and huge eye poops.
I'm laughing, it's great. Ah, there is a problem. Waw, "Dumbo?!"
Okay, the respect has disappeared
"Dumbo asks for food since a few dozen of minutes but I have to finish my game bef... ?!!!!"
This drawing is really good. Well done Camille. "I allowed myself to repost my fanart of Squeezie,
so Squeezie could see it, it means a lot of work" Just congratulations, so stylish,
I love because there are so many different styles,
You make Jumbo always cuter than other cats
he is endearing, he is so dumb and naive, I love him. WOW, "don't change your haircut"
I don't know if my reaction is because the drawing is stylish or
because he totally destroyed my haircut
Dude, I take it. Do you see, he has his own style,
it's so powerful. Wah, it looks like a drawing of caricature in the newspapers
I don't know if it's a compliment what I say but in my head, it is.
Well done, Gox and not Matteo Siboulette, you had fun to stole it?
your family name is a plant. Oh, he drew my desk,
Jumbo here, but the faces, he was lazy to do it.
I did again from my own hands. No, I don't trust you,
that poor guy had his drawing stolen 18 times, it is because when we type "Squeezie fanart" it might appears
in the very first...
Yay, look at this, congrats! "Gox blog"
You know what? We will go on his blog, it was done in 2015, 2 years ago, well done Gox.
Oh, this one is super cool, he made me way more stylish than I am,
it's wonderful, the mic with the hand and the big screen...
It makes me thinking at "Teacher Sakamoto", I don't know how it is called,
it's the best video of the world, YES, this is it, it's so good, to put it in a nutshell, that's a guy
it's a guy in a high school who is too much stylish,
he is very seductive, so strong and people sometimes,
try to do to him nasty things, so here he perfectly replies to the question of the teacher,
he is very precise, he is disguted and
he will make the joke of the "I take off your chair"
and Yamamoto, when he sits on his chair,
he is sat in the void, it made me thinking about that. Oh the crab...
It's wonderful!
He totally created a universe "Crabscribe"
5,000,000M views, my tattoo
Vlog at the ski, crazy dude, too much imagination! well done Noë!
Ah, reference to the video where we are in Stalins shoes
"There is my fanart inspired by the communist propaganda during the Stalin era, I hope you'll love it!"
oh I didn't see but the crab's tattoo is on all the flags!
Well done really. This is me when I'm...
What is her name?
SHUUUUUUUUUUT UUUUUUUUUP
Ohhhh, "his name is Squeeeeeezeh"
"I loved to draw you, drawing is my hobby,
I hope you'll enjoy it!"
But the truth is it's a Instagram filter where you put the option "denoise" at 100%!
Ooohhh, a evolving Squeezamon,
do you think I would be like this one day? maybe he saw in the future,
in 4 years, I would have that face with a long mustache like this and a fidget spinner?
No no no, "I see plenty of drawings that does not have the shares they deserved,
thank you to the thiefs and ABOVE ALL, continue to do this"
he put a picture of the game "thief" with a fanart in his hand
this one is the one which has been the most stolen! Poor Gox we love him.

he does trash drawings and he does all his characters like that. Olalah, too much level,
oh Lucio has a little angel halo, too cute
I took 6kg with my cheeks,

haha, he totally took a screen from a video game!
he erased the name of the guy and he put "Lucas" (Squeezie's name), some people are smart to deflect the law

Me and my brother. That's crazy how you make our noses
the one of my brother in this case.
wooow, neko-chan drawing, well done,
there is the crab right here so I know it's me she tried to draw

You are right!

the size of this forehead, the size of this hand,
it's crazy! Well done Nelson,

thank you Maxenss

"Parodie Sport" his youtube channel and its totally beautiful!
congrats dude! *follow*

you took the hairs from a real picture right?
How with that, you can do that?!

how did do that? You did that, you do a layer like that,
After, you colorize that to enlight the dark locations,
then, you do the same with all the skin and wow! that's crazy, now we'll do same with the hairs,
that's just truly amazing,
such skill! So I wanted to show you some fanarts that have been made since a few years
that I saw and I never thanked them all,
He did something crazy,
there is also this one, this is crazy, it was in...2014!
Oh, this one is also good!
about the game "Hello neighbour", this one is totally crazy also,
on millions of arts, there is many people who did great things!
and thank you to every people who post regularly, and thank you to people who
participate on Twitter, my heart warmed a lot,
you are filled by skill, and as promised,
I will show you something
that is in the background since a while
and I wanted to display this one that I took from my last trip in Japan, with my dad and my brother,
this is just a caricature of my brother, my dad,
and me in One Punch man DBZ
and Naruto, it will be displayed here soon
it was a Japanese girl filled with so much talent in a mall,
where I said myself "I have to obtain a caricature"
and this girl did that in like 10 minutes, this is unbelivable.
She does not have as much skill as you all but don't tell that to her. Thank you everybody for participating, I'm sorry if some people didn't see their
drawing in the video but I received so many drawings
that I would did a video of 28h to watch them all
thank you a lot
if you made me a drawing that took you 10 minutes or 8 hours,
it's super cute from you, never steal drawings from other people,
it's not okay for them,
this is work and it's hard to create a community and when your work is being stolen,
it could digust you, I would punch you.
Even the camera wants to punch you little thief, it switched off,
and because it's the end, I don't change the battery, I tell you goodbye on a black background, bye!
